title: Cant add my friend!!
body: I have tried to add my friend, but this message keep popping up: YIKES! Summoner name do not exist. And im sure that its the right name, my friend was whit me when i tried to add him. And we also have tried when we both are logged in, and when both of us is in a game, and when both of us not in a game. PLEASE HELP!!

replies.body: The only thing I can think of that could cause this is either if the friend is blocked, or if you're both on different regions.  You'll both want to be on the same region, like NA, in order to find each other.  I hope that helps!

When you both are in-game you're not able to add each other via the client. Only after the match is done. 

Also, have you checked that your friend doesn't have any special letter in his name?
